room_title: Escape room "Bonnie & Clyde: The Great Heist" by College Town Escape Rooms in Hattiesburg
room_description: After joining Bonnie and Clyde's team of mischief bandits, your group has been tasked with putting on a heist at the local saloon. However, it will not be an easy job: the owners are cautious and have hidden their valuables all around the saloon. Can you find all of the secret stashes and escape before the saloon opens?
